title: StrongOD Driver missing
content:
Rather short question.

So i've taken to using StrongOD for Ollydbg and I noticed that the fengyue0.sys doesn't exist, I had googled around and restarted my computer in hopes it would be created, yet no dice.

Does anyone know how to aquire this?

comments.text: You may use a better stealth plugin TitanHide for kernel mode or ScyllaHide for user mode. They have all batteries included.
